mapper.insert: insert ignore into student (stuid, stupwd, stuname, stusex, sturace, stuorigin, stuenrollment, stucollege, stumajor, stuclass, stuphone, stuphoto) VALUES(#{stuid},MD5(#{stupwd}),#{stuname},#{stusex},#{sturace},#{stuorigin},#{stuenrollment},#{stucollege},#{stumajor},#{stuclass},#{stuphone},#{stuphoto})
mapper.update: update student set stustate=false where stuid=#{stuid}
update student set stustate=true where stuid=#{stuid}
update student set stupwd=MD5(#{newpwd}) where stuid=#{stuid} and stupwd=MD5(#{stupwd})
mapper.select: select * from student where stuid in (select stuid from stucourse where courseid=#{courseid})
